claim: The Golden Girls stars a trained dog as the family pet.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Any dog can be a companion dog , and many working types such as retrievers are enjoyed primarily for their friendly nature as a family pet , as are mixed breed dogs .

claim: The Golden Girls stars a trained dog as the family pet.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Companion dog usually describes a dog that does not work , providing only companionship as a pet , rather than usefulness by doing specific tasks .

premise_source_doc_sentence: The dining establishment features a menu which is heavy on fare referential to the program , with cakes dedicated to the stars including ; `` Dorothy 's salted caramel cheese cake '' in tribute to the ornery senior citizen who was portrayed by Bea Arthur on the program , the coconut `` Betty White cake '' dedicated to the wholesome Golden Girl Rose Nylund , `` Rue 's Orange Poppyseed Cake ''  (  taken from the entertainer 's own recipe  )  , and `` Sophia 's cure for depression cookies '' honoring Estelle Getty 's role on the program as the grand dame of the crowd who as the mother of the character Dorothy was one generation older than the other three gals .
